message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet high standards and provide exceptional value. This item is truly a testament to quality and craftsmanship. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. For this extraordinary product, I am offering it to you for $100. I hope you find this price fair and look forward to your response.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're placing on your product. However, I'm looking for something within my budget. Would you consider selling the product for $85?

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and am willing to negotiate. To bring the product within your preferred price range, I am now offering it to you for $90. I hope this revised price meets your expectations and allows you to consider purchasing our premium product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $87 for your product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

I appreciate your effort to stay within your budget, Bob. Considering your proposal, I am willing to offer the product to you for $89. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while also accommodating your financial considerations. I hope this revised offer is more suitable for you.
